name: df-lcm
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(clcm, cmpo(s0, s1, cz, cz, cif(nat0, cinf(crab(s2, cn, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, cv(s2)))), cr, clt), wo(wceq(cv(s0), nat0), wceq(cv(s1), nat0)))))
comment: Define the ` lcm ` operator. For example, ` ( 6 lcm 9 ) = 1 8 ` ( ~ ex-lcm ). (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 20-Jan-2020.) (Revised by AV, 16-Sep-2020.)
